content: AI T43-P Asset tag Very robust stainless steel tracking tag for tools and equipment exposed to extremely tough environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Software > Construction management software- - - ### FEATURES:Features Laser engraved 2D barcode (data matrix) for more reliable identification High resistance to mechanical impact, abrasion, fuel, water and extreme temperatures due to stainless steel body Diverse fastening options with zip ties, metal tyraps, screws and rivets Applications Attach to assets with uneven surfaces and/or exposed to high mechanical impact (e.g. concrete pumps, hoses, chains, shackles, key rings, etc.) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 0.7 x 0 x 1.7 in Barcode type: 2D barcode (Datamatrix ECC200) Operating temperature range: -40 - 392 °F Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 0.7 x 0 x 1.7 in | Barcode type | 2D barcode (Datamatrix ECC200) | Operating temperature range | -40 - 392 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2223954 - ON!Track tag AI T43-P - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x AI T43-P ON!Track tag
